verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bwana harusi na bibi harusi,
leo mmefunga ndoa ya maisha,
kaeni kwa amani kidededede. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Upendo wenu umedhihirika
uyani kwenu
bamba ishini tototo.
Uzuri wenu hauna kifani -
uyani kwenu
bamba ishini tototo.
Na nyumba yenu imebarikiwa -
uyani kwenu
bamba ishini tototo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jitulize mjisikie sukari,
siku ya leo ni yenu, furahini,
mmepambwa maua
mnapendeza. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bwana harusi pagawa
changamka,
Bibi harusi chachawa,
chezacheza, penzi lenu
leo limekamilika. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mapenzi yenu kweli
yatasitawi,
hakika yatasitawi
yatamea kama ule
mwerezi wa Lebanoni. x2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Baraka zake Mungu
ziwashukie kaeni pasipo shida
siku zote nyumba yenu
iwe hekalu la Mungu. x2
